title: Bloody Sweet Scandal
alternative_title: 腥甜绯闻 ; Xīng Tián Fēi Wén
status: 腥甜绯闻 ; Xīng Tián Fēi Wén
description:
Description :
        A hot-tempered Taoist priest finds himself entangled with an arrogant vampire, drawn into a whirlwind of love and hatred fueled by karmic ties from their past lives.
In the present day, he’s barely scraping by, working odd jobs on a film set. But one day, he senses a powerful, ominous energy. When he looks up, he’s shocked to find that the source is none other than the nation’s biggest movie star, Shen Que?! The charming and sophisticated actor the world admires—is actually a thousand-year-old vampire?
“You’re not getting away from me this time!”
